Text: Oñ e̩gba kʼAtalaya iye Ehazaya li ka kʼo̩ma-wñ leku, i kwane̩ kʼi fʼugbe̩ onu chaka kpa rinyo̩.

Ama Jiho̩she̩ba, o̩ma onu Joram onobule̩, kʼi chʼo̩maye Ehazaya, mu Joash o̩ma Ehazaya du, oñ i mʼu ji kwef amo̩ma onu ku ma akpa le̩, tʼowñ, tʼe̩ne̩ kʼi anʼe̩, i mʼuma ko jʼef unyi ugbo ku ma kʼate̩ jo̩; ma la mʼu du maja bʼeju Atalaya te̩, oñ ma ma dʼu kpa n;
i la maja ugbo-wñ ef unyi Jihofa le̩ o̩do̩ me̩fa. Oñ Atalaya chʼonu ane̩ le̩.

Tak o̩do̩ e̩kebie-wñ Jiho̩yada fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ kʼi ko amagboji one̩ ogu-me̩lu ogume̩lu ku ma nʼo̩da abide wa, kpai amonuche̩, oñ i mʼuma ko wʼugbo-wñ ef unyi Jihofa; tak i fʼalo kpe̩ kpai ama, oñ i je̩ ñwu ma go̩ ñw u ef unyi Jihofa le̩, tak i dʼo̩ma onu ña ma.
Oñ i ñwa ñwu ma kakini, E̩wñ kʼame̩ ache de̩, kakini, Ukpe̩re̩ta me̩ ku me̩ guduwa o̩jo̩ uñmi, achʼamadide unyi onu;
ukpe̩re̩ta me̩ʼka ajo̩ alaku Sur; ukpe̩re̩taʼka la ajo̩ ugbo alaku ubi amadide le̩: abe̩le̩ ame̩ anʼide le̩ ade, kʼame̩ kʼi fʼo̩na-wñ kpa;
tak uche̩ meji-me̩, owñ chʼabo ku ma ledufu o̩jo̩ uñmi le̩ chaka, adide unyi Jihofa lʼonu daka.

Oñ ame̩ adonyʼonu daka, e̩wñ ido̩na ogu ki nadʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-me̩; oñ e̩ne̩ du kʼi gudu tef abo ku ma tala jo̩ le̩, me̩ je̩ ñwu ma mʼu du kpa; ame̩ ki la jʼugbo onu e̩gba kʼi adufu kpʼe̩gba kʼi agudu tʼejefu.

Tak amagboji one̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu le̩ che teju e̩wñ du ki Jihoyada, atama le̩, ñwate̩; oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ mʼabo-wñ ko, owñ chʼabo kidukpe̩ ku ma gudu nyʼejefu o̩jo̩ uñmi, manyʼabo ki dukpe̩ ku ma ledufu o̩jo̩ uñmi, oñ ma lewa ugbo Jiho̩yada atama.
Tak atama le̩ mʼo̩kwo̩ kpai ugbe̩yo̩ kʼonu Defid ne̩, ki jʼef unyi Jihofa le̩, ko ñw amagboji one̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu.
Tak abo ide kwodago jo̩, e̩wñ ido̩na ogu-wñ dʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩, akwʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ unyi le̩ gbogbo tʼo̩wo̩ awohi-wñ, ma talajo̩ o̩la ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kpai o̩la unyi le̩, alʼonu daka.
Tak i mʼo̩ma onu du dufu, i la mʼike̩be̩ du dʼo oji, oñ i mʼe̩wñ ibenu du ñw u; taku ma mʼu du jʼonu, ma la fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji; taku ma kwogwʼo̩wo̩, oñ ma kakini, Oji onu ki gbo kalakala!
Tak e̩gba kʼAtalaya gbʼekuku abo ide kpai amone̩, i lewa ugbo amone̩ efunyi Jihofa;

oñ i go, e̩ la go, onu dago ugbo ebije ikpa ki dago waala o̩mo̩, alu ku ma che le̩, oñ amagboji kpai amafʼo̩kakachi jʼugbo onu; amone̩ ane̩ le̩ du jʼayo̩, oñ ma nʼo̩kakachi ala. Tak Atalaya fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana, oñ i chane̩ ekpogu kakini, Alo ma da nyu mi-i! Alo ma da nyu mi-i!

Taku Jiho̩yada, atama, ñwa ñw amagboji one̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu ku ma nʼo̩da abogu, oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Mʼu du dufu lʼagbagba abo ku ma tala jo-i; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi tʼo̩ ubi, me̩ nʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpa. Todu atama le̩ kakini, Me̩ ki dʼu kpa ef unyi Jihofa n.
Abe̩le̩ ma mʼo̩na bite̩ ñw u; oñ i lʼo̩na kʼamanya ale tʼunyi onu; o̩mo̩ le̩ ma la dʼu kpa.
Taku Jiho̩yada fʼalo kpe̩ agbagba Jihofa kpʼonu kpʼamone̩ le̩, kʼama ki chʼamone̩ Jihofa; kpʼagbagba onu kpʼamone̩ le̩ ge̩.

Tak abo ane̩ le̩ chaka le tʼunyi Beal, oñ ma fʼu kpo̩fo̩ wane̩; ma fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩-wñ kpai ojibo-wñ guche̩ rinyo̩ ye̩ge̩ye̩ge̩, oñ ma du Maian, atama Beal, kpa o̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩. Tak atama O̩jo̩ fʼabo ku ma anʼo̩da unyi Jihofa chi jo̩.

Oñ i mʼamagboji one̩ ogume̩lu ogume̩lu kpʼabo ku ma dide kpʼamonuche̩, kpai amone̩ ane̩ le̩ chaka ko; tak abo le̩ dʼonu gwo̩ru kwugbo unyi Jihofa wa, oñ ma le o̩na alaku adide tʼunyi onu. Tak i kwogugu oj ede amonu.
Abe̩le̩ amone̩ ane̩ le̩ chaka nayo̩, oñ ewo le̩ fʼuñmi ne̩. Ma la nʼo̩be̩chageli kpa Atalaya ugbo unyi onu e̩gbale̩ me̩.
O̩do̩ Jihoash chʼebie e̩gba kʼi chane̩ ejʼo̩fe̩.
